name: Baby Care Game
description:
It’s time to collect the toys, what wants the baby? Look good so you do not waste time. Pick six of the twelve toys and watch out that you pick the right one. Creep as fast as you can across the room, so you can get on with the game. Let the lady baby have fun with his selected toys! Be quick before he will burst in tears. Get the milk before you forget the milk and get his teat.

Little baby bath time -
Now it’s time to wash the baby. In this kids care game you can you choose from four different shampoo’s , four different color bubbles, three bath toys and four different hair shampoo’s.

Little baby care Time –
Dry him with the towel, let his hair blow dry, cam his hair and spray and powder his skin. Then it's time for a clean diaper.

Baby Dress up time -
In this young kids games you can also dress up this little baby, you can choose from five different shoes, dresses and hats. So you can create many different outfits.

This little baby care game appropriate for beginners and of course for kids who love to caring. Taking care for baby is perfect to play by all ages!
